getBounds

public abstract java.awt.Shape getBounds()
Gets a shape containing all pair or thread segments of the partition.

Returns:
a shape containing all pair or thread segments of the partition. Adjacent hulls should not overlap but preferably touch one another with a (complex) line in stead of individual points.
